section.heading: Criminal penalties.
section.text: A person who willfully or recklessly violates this part or a regulation promulgated pursuant to this part shall be guilty of a misdemeanor and, upon conviction, shall be subject to a fine not to exceed $25,000 per offense per day, imprisonment not to exceed one year, or both. The fines set forth in this section shall not be limited by § 22-3571.01.

annotations.annotation: as added Sept. 9, 2014, D.C. Law 20-135, § 101(b), 61 DCR 6767
